body: I know this will get translated eventually but I hope they wait for a raw that is less censored. Rama's earlier work now has less censored versions but no one ever updates the translations.
Rama always makes some S tier hentais
Someone should desencor and translate this ASAP.

Actually waiting for 3rd volume of delinquent girl, but that one should wait until summer (probably summer Comiket). | Wish he could have treat her better though, but he's being a typical hentai high school boy with too much lust. If he really don't want her to be taken by other men, he could have supported her so she can say no when people keep pushing inconvenient things to her.

Yuuki, the girl, can't say no to people's request, so they keep pushing her jobs. Uchida, the boy, knew about it and after asking her to help him study, also asks for a blowjob. After that, he confessed he loves her, but she rejected, thinking it might just a momentarily decision. Although, Uchida is persistent and they gets to sex. Later, he asks to study in her house, although it ends with continuous sex while he keep saying he loves her. Uchida is probably just desperate, because Yuuki is the only girl who would take him, and he is always anxious because he knew she can't refuse, so he's not special at all and she would have done the same to any guy if they push her.
